Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Island
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable, Serializable
public class Island extends Object implements Movable, Serializable
The class island represent an island in the game, in the island can be stored students, and can be present a different number of towers, an island ccan have an owner if a player conquer it through the rule game

      public Island(int id)
      Creator of the entity Island
      Parameters:
      id - is the identification number (the first nickname) of the island

      Creator of a new Island merging two others
      Parameters:
      i1 - is the first Island to be merged
      i2 - is the second Island to be merged

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public String getId()
      Method to return the id of the Island
      Returns:
      the String representing the id of the Island (or all the id of the Islands which made the major Island)

    • getOwner

      public ColorTower getOwner()
      Method to get the current owner of the Island
      Returns:
      the tower's color representing the current Player/Team owner

      Method to return the Report of the Island (the Report contains all the info useful to compute the influence of the Players on the Island)
      Returns:
      tne Report of the Island

      public ArrayList<Student> getAllStudents()
      Method to return the copy of all the Students contained on the Island

      the ArrayList containing all the Students on the Island

    • removeStudent

      public Student removeStudent(int id) throws IllegalMoveException
      Method to remove a Student from the Island
      Specified by:
      removeStudent in interface Movable
      Parameters:
      id - is the id of the Student to be removed
      Returns:
      the Student removed
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if there is no Student with such id on this Island

    • conquest

      public void conquest(ColorTower t)
      Method to change the owner of the Island
      Parameters:
      t - is the Player's color who has to become the new owner of the Island

    • setProhibition

      public void setProhibition(boolean prohibitionToken) throws IllegalMoveException
      Method to place a Prohibition-Token on the Island
      Parameters:
      prohibitionToken - is the boolean indicating if a Token is placed or not on the Island
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - if there is already a Prohibition Token on this Island

    • getProhibition

      public boolean getProhibition()
      Method to return if a Prohibition-Token is on the Island or not
      Returns:
      true if the Token is on the Island, false otherwise

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Overriding method to compare two Islands
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - is the Island to be compared with this
      Returns:
      true if two Islands are the same (if the id are the same), false otherwise

      Overriding method to return the id of the Island
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      the entire id of the Island

    • checkContainedId

      public boolean checkContainedId(int idToCheck)
      Method to check if the id of the Island contains idToCheck. In fact this.id is made by all the ids of the previous Islands, so through this method it is possible to check if this.Island is made by an Island
      Parameters:
      idToCheck - is the id of the Island to check if it is contained to this
      Returns:
      true if idToCheck is contained into this.id
